description:
"Brain-like" Knowledge Management Notes


[Optimized] Code block has been greatly improved and is consistent with the mainstream code editor experience. It also supports displaying and switching code languages ​​in the upper right corner of the code block.
[Optimized] Math Equation has been greatly improved, and keep the formula as form of picture when export to word.
[Optimized] Use built-in emoji icons to keep consistently when synchronizing data on multiple platforms.
[Optimized] Improve the interactive experience of many PDFs.
[Optimized] Automatically remove invisible blank characters in copied text
